featured.text: When he found her, he said, “I know how valuable this stone is, but I’m giving it back to you, 24 that you can give me something even more precious.
She still possessed her most valuable asset—her mind.

100% Fish takes the initiative to show seafood companies the importance of collaboration, and facilitate valuable connections between fishing companies and other participants of the project, including academia, start-ups, and research and development teams.

definition.example: This antique vase is very valuable.
